original_text: Tell me, who decided in the beginning, that all these things must happen? Who told us about them before they happened? Then we could say, “He was right!” None of your idols said anything about it! Nobody heard them say a word! Tell me, who decided in the beginning, that all these things must happen? Who told us about them before they happened? Then we could say, “He was right!” None of your idols said anything about it! Nobody heard them say a word! Tell me, who decided in the beginning,
korean_text: 누가 처음부터 이 일을 알게 하여 우리가 알았느냐 누가 이전부터 알게 하여 우리가 옳다고 말하게 하였느냐 알게 하는 자도 없고 들려 주는 자도 없고 너희 말을 듣는 자도 없도다

sentences.original_text: that all these things must happen?

sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리가 말할 수 있었을 것

sentences.original_text: None of your idols said anything about it!
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 우상 중 아무도 그것에 대해 아무 말도 하지 않았습니다!

sentences.original_text: Nobody heard them say a word!
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그들이 한마디 하는 것을 듣지 못했습니다!

sentences.original_text: that all these things must happen?

sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그들이 한마디 하는 것을 듣지 못했습니다!
